content: TITLE: Running Integration Tests for Git Protocol DESCRIPTION: Command to execute integration tests for the Git protocol using npm. These tests likely involve a Gitea docker image for simulating Git server interactions. SOURCE: https://github.com/abapgit/abapgit/blob/main/test/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: Shell CODE: ``` npm run integration ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Managing Gitea Docker Container DESCRIPTION: Basic Docker Compose commands for managing a Gitea installation. Includes commands to start containers in detached mode, check container status, view logs, and stop/remove containers. SOURCE: https://github.com/abapgit/abapgit/blob/main/test/gitea/notes.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker-compose up -d ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker-compose ps ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker-compose logs ``` LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` docker-compose down ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Unit Tests with npm in Node.js DESCRIPTION: Command to run unit tests locally using npm in a Node.js environment version 20 or higher. These tests are harmless and do not require network connectivity. SOURCE: https://github.com/abapgit/abapgit/blob/main/test/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Shell CODE: ``` npm run unit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Referencing ABAP Integration Test Class DESCRIPTION: ABAP class name for integration testing related to the Git protocol. This class is not installed on systems and is meant to be edited in VSCode or copied and pasted. SOURCE: https://github.com/abapgit/abapgit/blob/main/test/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: ABAP CODE: ``` ZCL_ABAPGIT_INTEGRATION_GIT ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Changelog Legend in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Defines a legend for categorizing changes in the changelog using Markdown syntax. Categories include fixed, changed, added, and removed items. SOURCE: https://github.com/abapgit/abapgit/blob/main/changelog.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` Legend ------ * : fixed ! : changed + : added - : removed ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Formatting Changelog Entry in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Shows the structure of a changelog entry for a specific version, including the version number, release date, and categorized list of changes. SOURCE: https://github.com/abapgit/abapgit/blob/main/changelog.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` 2025-01-01 v1.131.0 ------------------- ! Remove need to `parallel_generators` server group (#7119) + VIEW: save `tddat` entries to transport (#7042) + Support for HTTP Destination (#7100) + Enhance logging with message id and number (#7111) * Fix language conversion for language A (#7076) * longtexts: workaround strange object names dump (#7077) * SRVB: Clear fields and fix deserialize order (#7085) * MSAG: Fix error handling during deletion (#7093) * Fix error handling in exception viewer (#7095) * Fix dark theme CSS whitespace (#7104) * MSAG: Fix deletion of message longtexts (#7109) * Fix RFC error handling (#7102) * IDOC/IEXT: Fix deserialize in background (#7113) * USCA: Fix missing transport entry (#7110) * FUGS: Fix activation error (#7115) * Limit number of GUI sessions (#7080) * Fix dump when converting `xstring` to `bintab` (#7120) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Picture Element Configuration DESCRIPTION: HTML code block defining responsive logo display based on color scheme preferences. Uses picture element with multiple sources for dark/light modes. SOURCE: https://github.com/abapgit/abapgit/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Linking to GitHub Security Advisory in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to create a Markdown link to the 'Report a Vulnerability' page in GitHub's Security Advisory section for the abapGit project. SOURCE: https://github.com/abapgit/abapgit/blob/main/SECURITY.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ["Report a Vulnerability"](https://github.com/abapGit/abapGit/security/advisories/new) ```
